strapiPost.title: University Associated Record Label Releases First EP
strapiPost.content:
Local record label Hill Records has released its first EP (extended player) and it features music from 3 Arkansas artists. 

  • Vibrations: The EP is called From The High Ground and has 1 song from each of 3 local artist: Foxpaw of Fayetteville, NWA native Pat Ryan Key, and H3ADCANNON are the artists featured. You can find the music on streaming platforms like Apple Music and Spotify.
  • The real world: Hill Records is a student-run record label at the University of Arkansas that gives students real-life experiences in the music industry. The artists on this EP and other Hill Records artists will be featured in a showcase at Georges Majestic Lounge on May 3. 

Read the full story HERE.
